summary:
Many Khajiit disdain weapons in favor of their natural claws. 
They make excellent thieves due to their natural agility and unmatched acrobatics ability. 
Khajiit have developed a natural proficiency in stealth, and have the added benefit of native night vision, many Khajiit outside of their home province to become bandits or professional thieves
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]BlQHlJgRJdg[/youtube][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/title2_zps03e64674.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/khajittlore_zpsb84afbc8.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/lore_zps44fde5a4.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/khajittinfo_zpsc1de5e51.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/kaplan_zps91a73603.png[/IMG][/center]
[color=#E42217][size=3][i]*You will find Kaplan relaxing with some mead at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. 
His name is Kaplan, but his closest friends have always called him Kep, you have been warned. 
Keep in mind he is a retired assassin, so he is Stealthy, may even the sneaky types like to have someone like him with them to cover their back.
He has his own daggers, one of which is enchanted; Yes, he is a dual wielder, but will heal if he needs to.
He\'s fully perked up to be as stealthy as he can be.[/color][/size]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/install_zps792894c1.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=4]Simply open the .rar file, drag and drop the Data file into your Skyrim folder.[/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=4]To uninstall, just delete the following,[/center][/color][/size]
[size=3]Data > [color=black][b]Kaplan.esp[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3]Data > textures > actors > character > facegendata > facetint > [color=black][b]Kaplan.esp[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3]Data > meshes > actors > character > facegendata > facegeom > [color=black][b]Kaplan.esp[/b][/color][/size]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/requirements_zpsa6e8676e.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=4]To get Kaplan to look as she does in the pictures, he will need the following mods:[/center][/color][/size]

[color=#E42217][size=4]~ [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/beta/skse_1_06_13.7z]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/url] for her High Res warpaints to show up properly (Highly Recommended, as he will not look good without it, while using SKSE, you will also need the High Res Warpaint Tweak aswell.)
~ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D5941]Coverkhajiits[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2788925]mrLenski[/url]
~ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6192/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D6192]JazzJR CoverKhajiits Bodytexture Ver1[/url] by JazzJR
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/recommended_zpse1fcc76e.png[/IMG][/center]
[center](not needed but recommended)[/center]
~ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29977/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D29977]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/726673]Xenius[/url] for the high res beast tintmasks.

*Keep in mind, that he wears Thieves Leather Armor and its up to [b]YOU[/b] to give him the gear he needs to wear to follow you into battle!* [/color][/size][/i]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/permission_zps39088a21.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][color=#E42217][size=4]The assets from this file may not be used without my expressed permission, nor shall this file be uplaoded anywhere else at any other sites. Thank you for your respect regarding this.[/center][/color][/size]
[center][IMG]http://i1340.photobucket.com/albums/o723/Diethardt/acknowledgements_zpsea0ef404.png[/IMG][/center]
[size=4][center][color=#E42217][b]HUGE THANKS[/b][/color] to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5531736]MissMorose[/url] for helping me test Kaplan as well as taking all of the beautiful screenshots for him also! Keep it up! Your screenarchery is Exceptional![/center][/size]
[size=4][center][color=#E42217][b]BIG SHOUT OUT[/b][/color] to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2599546]CaptainShack[/url] for the Awesome work he did on the video spotlight for Kaplan![/center][/size]

[size=4][center][i][b]Other mods that are Awesome!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D31665]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by Me
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31332/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D31332]Weathered and Worn Warpaints[/url] by Me
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25791]TairenSoul Tattoo Warpaint for Men[/url] by TairenSoul
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25211]TairenSoul Face Tattoo Warpaint (women)[/url] by TairenSoul[/i][/b][/center][/size]
author: Diethardt
